about_the_game:
• This is the full UNLOCKED game including all options, with a 15 minute timer.
  • Once the timer is up, you have to quit the game and reopen it to play again.
  • I was inspired by the time-locked PS1 and Dreamcast era demos I played growing up to just give you the full game, with the slight annoyance of having to relaunch it if you want to play again.
detailed_description:
• This is the full UNLOCKED game including all options, with a 15 minute timer.
  • Once the timer is up, you have to quit the game and reopen it to play again.
  • I was inspired by the time-locked PS1 and Dreamcast era demos I played growing up to just give you the full game, with the slight annoyance of having to relaunch it if you want to play again.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13: High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If in-game UI looks incorrect, disable fullscreen from options.

name: Match Match Mania! Demo
